set.name: CustomActionsXml
set.value: <menu><item title="Set in Progress" image="clock_history_frame.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=5,Form=Incident_SetInProgress" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="On Hold" image="clock_select_remain.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=10,Form=Incident_OnHold" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Cancelled" image="brick_delete.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=8,Form=Incident_Cancelled" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Ready for Testing" image="brick_error.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=6,Form=Incident_ReadyForTesting" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Mark as Resolved" image="brick_go.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=7,Form=Incident_Accepted" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true"/> <item title="Send Question" image="email_go.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_Reply" attributes="id" pos="out" width="900" height="550" full="" showoutlabel="true"/></menu>
